org.apache.tephra.persist

Interface TransactionVisibilityState

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    TransactionSnapshot

    public interface TransactionVisibilityState
    Transaction Visibility state contains information required by TransactionProcessor CoProcessor to determine cell visibility.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      NavigableMap<Long,TransactionManager.InProgressTx> getInProgress()
      Returns the map of write pointers to in-progress transactions at the time of the snapshot.
      Collection<Long> getInvalid()
      Returns the list of invalid write pointers at the time of the snapshot.
      long getReadPointer()
      Returns the read pointer at the time of the snapshot.
      long getTimestamp()
      Returns the timestamp from when this snapshot was created.
      long getVisibilityUpperBound() 
      long getWritePointer()
      Returns the next write pointer at the time of the snapshot.

    • Method Detail

      • getTimestamp

        long getTimestamp()
        Returns the timestamp from when this snapshot was created.

      • getReadPointer

        long getReadPointer()
        Returns the read pointer at the time of the snapshot.

      • getWritePointer

        long getWritePointer()
        Returns the next write pointer at the time of the snapshot.

      • getInvalid

        Collection<Long> getInvalid()
        Returns the list of invalid write pointers at the time of the snapshot.

      • getInProgress

        NavigableMap<Long,TransactionManager.InProgressTx> getInProgress()
        Returns the map of write pointers to in-progress transactions at the time of the snapshot.

      • getVisibilityUpperBound

        long getVisibilityUpperBound()
        Returns:
        transaction id X such that any of the transactions newer than X might be invisible to some of the currently in-progress transactions or to those that will be started

        NOTE: the returned tx id can be invalid.
